doc.field: Bakery, Confectionery, and Tobacco Workers International Union, Local 3 Records and Photographs
Bakery, Confectionery, and Tobacco Workers International Union, Local 3 Records and Photographs
Series III: Bargaining and Arbitration Records
Series III: Bargaining and Arbitration Records

This series contains Local 3 standard contracts, agreements and negotiation notes. Also included at the end of this series are four files of notes and contracts pertaining to Locals 51, 153, 579 and the Specialty Bakery Owners of America. Included in these files can be found the negotiation notes of Frank Dutto, Harry Lorber and Michael Sandroff. (Note: For the arbitration between Local 3 and particular shops, consult Series IV: Shop Files.)
